markdownRemark.html:
When you feel like shit, sometimes people can get under your skin by telling you that it'll be ok if you stay optimistic. For one reason or another, someone else saying it isn't what you need. What they're are telling you is ( most of the time ) true - at least staying positive will make it more bearable. You just need to be the one to tell youself.

Staying aware that you can't do much in most situations is a powerful thing because it can help you to accept whatever happens. Trying to stay positive is better than accepting the misery that you can't and won't avoid as leaning into the negativity will more likely make it seem worse and give you a dreadful sense of anticipation.

frontmatter.title: Being Positive When You Don't Feel It
